articles.author: Brian Fung
articles.title: Apple backs down on EU ban for ‘Fortnite’-maker Epic Games - CNN
articles.description: Apple has abruptly reversed a decision to ban Epic Games, the maker of “Fortnite,” from launching its own app store on iOS in Europe — just a day after European Union officials said they were investigating the matter.
